shortdesc.ph: Callback when the RTMP transcoding settings are updated.
Callback when the RTMP transcoding settings are updated.
Callback when the RTMP transcoding settings are updated.
Callback when the RTMP transcoding settings are updated.

section.p: When the live streaming parameters in the method are updated, the callback is triggered and reports the update to the host.
When the parameters in the method are updated, the callback is triggered to notify the host of the update.
When the parameters in the method are updated, the callback is triggered to notify the host.
The callback is triggered and reports update information to the host when the parameters in the method are updated.
section.note: This callback is not triggered the first time you call the method to set the transcoding parameters .
This callback is not triggered the first time you set the transcoding parameters using the method.
This callback is not triggered the first time you call to set the parameters.
This callback is not triggered when you call for the first time to set the parameters.
